title: There after remaining tenements shall be allotted to the remaining Protected Occupiers by drawing of lots in the presence of the Protected Occupiers who are present at the time of such allotment
clause_text: There after remaining tenements shall be allotted to the remaining Protected Occupiers by drawing of lots in the presence of the Protected Occupiers who are present at the time of such allotment. As far as practicable a suitable video recording of the process shall be done, the cost of which shall be borne by the developer concerned. The Occupancy Certificate shall be issued, after the completion of procedure laid down herein above.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE PROTECTED OCCUPIERS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
